creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
text:
All other pages in the default pub open correctly through webdav because they
have the xhtml resource type.

The index page has resource type homepage and the links page has resource type
links, neither of which recognize the format webdavGET so they do not open.

creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
text: *** Bug 38931 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created attachment 17872
Proposed fix for making the homepage and links pages editable with WebDAV

This patch renames module.xconf for the homepage and links modules to
resource-type-homepage.xconf and resource-type-links.xconf respectively and it
adds the format webdavGET to each.  These match the changes made to the xhtml
module to make it webdav enabled.
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
thorsten@apache.org
text:
Thx Jonathan Addison,

however I know can edit both doctypes, but it seems that I cannot upload. I get:
dav:/default/webdav/> edit index_en.html

Progress: [=============================>] 100.0% of 2282 bytes succeeded.
Running editor: `vi /tmp/cadaver-edit-l2uSU6.html'...
Changes were made.
Uploading changes to `/default/webdav/index_en.html'
Progress: [=============================>] 100.0% of 2295 bytes failed:
415 Unsupported Media Type
Try uploading again (y/n)? y
Uploading changes to `/default/webdav/index_en.html'
Progress: [=============================>] 100.0% of 2295 bytes failed:
415 Unsupported Media Type
